typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> empsource
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> empdest
empdest, empsource join(empdest@EmpID == empsource@EmpID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
